department_of_defence_technology.summary: The Department of Defence Technology at Galgotias University offers B.Tech and M.Tech programs in Defence Technology, aligning education with national priorities and global trends. The school provides a blend of theory and practical training with specializations in Aerospace Technology, Communication Systems & Sensors, AI & Cyber Security, and Directed Energy Technology. They emphasize innovation, critical thinking, and discipline, preparing students for the defence sector through industry collaborations and ensuring they are industry-ready.
department_of_defence_technology.raw_content:
Enquire Now
Department of Defence Technology
• Message from the Dean
Message from the Dean
At Galgotias University, we believe that education must align with national priorities and emerging global trends. Our B.Tech and M.Tech programs in Defence Technology reflect this vision—designed to nurture engineers and innovators who are ready to contribute meaningfully to India’s defence capabilities.
The School of Defence Technology offers a unique blend of theoretical knowledge and hands-on training, guided by experienced faculty and industry experts. With specializations in Aerospace Technology, Communication Systems & Sensors, AI & Cyber Security, and Directed Energy Technology, students gain exposure to cutting- edge technologies that are shaping the future of defence and strategic sectors worldwide.
We take pride in fostering a culture of innovation, critical thinking, and discipline—qualities that define the defence ecosystem. Our collaborations with key industry players and R&D institutions ensure that students are industry-ready from day one.
As we prepare the next generation of technologists and defence strategists, I invite aspiring students to become a part of this mission-driven academic journey. At Galgotias, you won’t just earn a degree—you will build a future that serves the nation.
